title: White House Announces $200M State Ballroom Construction Project
summary: President Trump announced a $200 million State Ballroom project for the White House, designed as a 90,000 sq ft event space with gold and crystal features, marking the first significant structural addition to the Executive Mansion since the 1948 Truman balcony.
